casebody.data:
In the Matter of: C.N.H-P., M.S.N.P., A.D.S., M.C-N.H-P. No. 236P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016. Jeffrey William Gillette, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Sierra Pharr, for Pharr, Sierra. Roger A. Askew, Attorney at Law, for Wake County Human Services. James Michael Weiss, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for GAL.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st of June 2016 by Respondent (Mother) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
